import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Card, Row, Col, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, CardBody, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { Febric, Video, Details, ProductReview, Brand, Availability, AddToCart, BuyNow } from '../../../../../../../constant'; import Ratings from 'react-ratings-declarative'; import "./styles.css"; import moment from "moment"; const BottomContainerHelper = ({ streamData }) => { console.log("streamData", streamData) const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const symbol = "$"; const [ rating, setRating ] = useState(0); const singleItem = { variants: ["", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""], discountPrice: "450", price: "575", stock: "11" }; const changeRating = (newRating) => { setRating(newRating) } // return bottom portion data (MAIN data...) return (
setActiveTab('1')}> TAB ONE
setActiveTab('2')}> TAB TWO
setActiveTab('3')}> TAB THREE
setActiveTab('4')}> TAB FOUR
